title: Angelina Jolie's 14-year-old daughter Zahara wears her new jewelry collection
text:
Zahara Jolie-Pitt may only be 14, but she's already getting to work.

The teen daughter of Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt has created the Zahara Collection jewelry line made in collaboration with famous celebrity jeweler, Robert Procop.

And Zahara found the perfect spot to show off her designs, on the road with her mom Angelina for the premiere of her new movie Maleficent: Mistress of Evil.

Mom and daughter: Zahara Jolie-Pitt is debuting her Zahara Collection jewelry line made in collaboration with famous celebrity jeweler Robert Procop on October 7 in Rome

She has been seen wearing the designs at the film's various premieres, from Rome to Hollywood.

The collection will be available at select Saks Fifth Avenue stores and various other retailers in the U.S. and Australia from November.

All proceeds from the collection will benefit the Los Angeles-based House of Ruth Shelters, which provided transitional housing for battered women and children.

Procop is well known to the Jolie-Pitts - he even designed Angelina's wedding ring for her ill fated marriage to Brad.

And back in 2012, he designed a collection with Procop called Style of Jolie.

The line featured quartz and gemstones in the limited collection.

Her own work: The teen modeled her designs at the film's world premiere in Los Angeles on September 30; she is joined by siblings Knox, Pax, Vivienne and Shiloh

Earrings: She wore a pair of tiered earrings for the occasion that complimented her matching bracelet and ring

The actress adopted Zahara back when she was just six months old back in 2005.

Her partner at the time, Brad Pitt, legally adopted her shortly after.

Zahara is joined by big brother Maddox, 18, Pax, 15, Shiloh, 13, and twins Vivienne and Knox, 11.

Brad and Angelina first met back in 2003 while filming their movie Mr. and Mrs. Smith that later premiered in 2005.

Pitt proposed in 2012 and they married a couple years later. The two announced their divorce back in 2016 and cited 'irreconcilable differences.'
description:
She's following in her famous mother's footsteps at just 14 years old.
And now Zahara Jolie-Pitt is debuting her Zahara Collection jewelry line made in collaboration with celebrity jeweler.
